answers.author: Eric Eddy
answers.text:
Our Animal Services division has made use of the American Veterinary Medicine Association calculator, available at http://www.avma.org/reference/marketstats/ownership_calculator.asp 
Information on the calculator, including the formulas and calculations behind it, can be found at http://www.avma.org/reference/marketstats/ownership.asp#formulas 
Obviously, additional calculations regarding budgeted dollar amount per citizen will need to be done based on your budgeted expenditures and expected revenues, but this information should give you a fairly sound starting point.

author: MiChielle Cooper
text:
Is there a formula for municipalities to calculate base on population and national averages of pet ownership/pets per household that can help place a dollar amount per citizen that should be allocated to animal care and control in a community?

title: calculating budget need for animal control & sheltering
